item.title: Thoughts on Musashi's Dokkōdō
item.description: Thoughts on Musashi’s Dokkōdō A while back, in an attempt to make myself write more consistently, I decided to delve into one of Musashi’s famous works, called Dokkōdō, or “The Way of Walking Alone”, which contains 21 principles that the legendary swordsman and philosopher lived by. The goal was to read those principles, one each day and, after some consideration, write down my thoughts on them (pretentious much?) in a short and objective way and share them.
